summary: This is a Cheat Mod with Azura's Star. You do not need to keep refilling with souls
descriptionHtml:
[b]Azura's Star[/b] is an artifact of the Daedric Prince [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Azura]Azura[/url], and is one possible reward for the quest [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/The_Black_Star_(Quest)]The Black Star[/url].
After finishing the quest, giving the star to [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Aranea_Ienith]Aranea Ienith[/url] will lead to the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Last_Dragonborn]Dragonborn[/url] being offered to keep [b]Azura's Star[/b]. Giving the star to [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Nelacar_(Skyrim)]Nelacar[/url] will lead to him offering the Dragonborn to keep [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/The_Black_Star_(Item)]The Black Star[/url]; equal to Azura's Star in all ways except it has the capability to contain both black and white souls. (INFINITE)

This is a [b]Cheat Mod[/b] with Azura's Star. You do not need to keep refilling with souls

VendorItemDaedricArtifact [KYWD:000917E8]
DaedricArtifact [KYWD:000A8668]
ReusableSoulGem [KYWD:000ED2F1]

Soul - Contained Soul: Grand
SLCP - Maximum Capacity: Grand

 You don't have to put any souls in it.

Azura's Star (Infinite) Infinite charges. In the event of malfunctions, add this code that allows to get infinite and unlimited magic. no more burdens on canes and others.  player.addperk 0401e7fb dawnguard and dragonborn
author: deasehack
